Event.name: Sleep_wake_cycle
Event.definition: <def-root>A <fen>Sleeper</fen> enters a state of consciousness of reduced external awareness, remains in this state for some amount of time, and (normally) returns to full wakeful consciousness.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Duration</fen> of time for which a state holds or a process is ongoing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Place
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the event occurs.</def-root>

Arg.name: Sleeper
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Sleeper</fen> is the entity that is sleeping.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.</def-root>
